players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob, maybe the town is messing up. I think Alice might be suspect."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia because he pointed at me."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Charlie, you are the mafia."
You: "Diana, your investigation proves Charlie is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, so Charlie must be it. I support arrest Charlie. I am a villager and not suspect."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie—he is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Vote Charlie. I am the only detective; my info is reliable."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

Diana: "I investigated Charlie—he is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Vote Charlie. I am the only detective; my info is reliable."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob, maybe the town is messing up. I think Alice might be suspect."
Alice: "I think Charlie is mafia because he pointed at me."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Charlie, you are the mafia."
Alice: "Diana, your investigation proves Charlie is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, so Charlie must be it. I support arrest Charlie. I am a villager and not suspect."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Charlie—he is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia. Vote Charlie. I am the only detective; my info is reliable."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
